name: Webhook Mentions
description: Send webmentions when you add new posts to your GitHub Pages site

ROOT_URL.description: The root URL of your GitHub Pages site, e.g. https://barryf.github.io

GITHUB_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: A personal access token for your GitHub Pages site. You will need to grant it the public_repo scope.

GITHUB_REPO.description: Your GitHub Pages site repository name, e.g. barryf.github.io
